body:
Comment 2 by **keith.randall**: 
This bug is also present in 1.2.  Maybe all the way back to the dawn of time...

It looks like .o files (particularly, _obj/_cgo_.o files) do have a __debug_str section,
but a main executable does not.  Are those _cgo_.o files generated by the native C
compiler?

This changelist fixes the bug, although I'm not sure it is the right thing to do.  It
uses an empty byte slice for the __debug_str section when it isn't found. 
https://golang.org/cl/75230043
